This way, when bugs attempt to eat the corn they're\nkilled right away (specifically their stomach is split open) because the plant\ncontains an invisible, built-in pesticide shield.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The particular gene\nadded to most corn crops is a type of Bt-toxin -- produced from Bacillus\nthuringiensis bacteria. Genetic engineers remove the gene that produces the Bt\nin bacteria and insert it into the DNA of corn (and cotton) plants. They claim\nthat Bt-toxin is quickly destroyed in human stomachs -- and even if it\nsurvived, it won't cause reactions in humans or mammals --is all bull... Bt\ntoxin is readily passing into the human bloodstream. Bt-toxin does causes adverse\nhealth effects in humans. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once these GM crops and genes get into the wild, they\nwill eventually contaminate all of the non-GM crops so that at some point in\nthe future, there will be no non-GM crops in the world! Once the GM genes have\ncontaminated all of the non-GM plants, there is presently no way to remove\nthese synthetic genes from the plants. We\u2019ll all be stuck with these toxic\nplants that produce toxic foods. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, it is said\nthat any food that comes in a box in the&nbsp;supermarket can be assumed to\ncontain GM elements.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">GM foods may be\nassociated with a number of problems. It is hard to specifically define them\nbecause biotechnology companies do not allow independent scientist to acquire\ntheir products. They have manipulated the political process so that they have\npatent protection over their GM products.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Monsanto\u2019s roundup is\nconsidered an \u201cxenoestrogen,\u201d which is a foreign estrogen that mimics real\nestrogen in our bodies. &nbsp;I am in the\nChemical field and we are trained in all this&nbsp;\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-g2M5xLgYY-s/VOsWGkUFDzI/AAAAAAAA1g8/XR7D5H7BNXM/s1600/glyphos3fbate.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2009, a French court\nfound Monsanto guilty of lying; falsely advertising its Roundup herbicide as\n\"biodegradable,\" \"environmentally friendly\" and claiming it\n\"left the soil clean.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Zionist GM companies\nhave bribed our politicians and lawmakers.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html?showComment=1554545285678#c8565357787050294355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 6, 2019 at 3:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME\u2014WHAT IS THIS IR8 RICE YOU HAVE MENTIONED IN YOUR BLOG..<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT SACRIFICED QUALITY FOR QUANTITY.. THE NUTRITIONAL VALUE IS VERY POOR.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/gm-ir8-rice-high-amylose-content.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA ITSELF WE HAD MORE THAN 1.82 LAKH ( 180,000 ) VARIETIES OF RICE.. RICE LIKE NJAVARA WAS PREVENTIVE MEDICINE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IR8 WAS A CONSPIRACY ON THE THIRD WORLD BY ROTHSCHILD USING HIS FRONTS\u2014THE FORD AND ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATIONS..<br />\n<br />\nFAMINE WAS DELIBERATELY CREATED AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC TO PUSH THSE USELESS VARIETIES OF RICE WHICH GIVE YOU BRAIN FOG AND REDUCED FERTILITY OF WOMEN..<br />\n<br />\nThe International Rice Research Institute (IRRI) is an international agricultural research and training organization with headquarters in Los Ba\u00f1os, Laguna in the Philippines and offices in seventeen countries with more than 1500 staff.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO CONTROL FOOD .<br />\n<br />\nSTERILE / TERMINATOR SEEDS WAS THE FIRST STEP..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSO SO SO-- In 1960, the KOSHER DEEP STATE established and funded the IRRI, the International Rice Research Institute, in the Philippines with Dr. Robert Chandler as its director. Henry Beachell became IRRI's chief rice breeder.<br />\n<br />\nThey imported seeds for over 10,000 varieties of rice from around the world. Many of these were dwarf varieties to cross with taller varieties.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1962, Dr. Peter Jennings made 38 crosses of various varieties at IRRI. The eighth was between a Chinese dwarf variety known as Dee-geo-woo-gen (DGWG) and a tall variety from Indonesia, Peta. This eighth cross was promising, but only 130 seeds were produced. How those 130 seeds became the famous IR8 variety was a DELIBERATE process \u2013<br />\n<br />\nThe 130 seeds were planted in pots to produce the first generation (F1) of plants. All were tall.<br />\n<br />\nThe F1 seeds were planted and produced about 10,000 second-generation (F2) plants. One-quarter of those plants were dwarf. That meant that dwarfism was controlled by a single gene in the DGWG variety, making the job of producing a commercial variety a lot easier.<br />\n<br />\nAll of the tall plants from the F2 generation were discarded, and the short plants were planted to become the F3 generation.<br />\n<br />\nFrom the F3 plants, Beachell used his plant judging skills to select 298 individual plants. Seeds from each of those plants were planted in individual \"pedigree rows\" to produce the fourth (F4) generation.<br />\n<br />\nIn that F4 generation, Beachell again selected the best individual plants. In row 288, the third plant in looked the best to him. He dubbed it IR8-288-3 and this F5 plant became the source for the revolutionary variety that became known simply as IR8.<br />\n<br />\nBy 1980, IR36 resisted pests and grew fast enough to allow two crops a year instead of just one, doubling the yield. Less time in chemical laden soil means less quality.. And by 1990, using more advanced genetic manipulation techniques, IR72 was outperforming even IR36<br />\n<br />\nBy employing \"Terminator\" genes, seed manufacturers can exercise patent enforcement techniques not too different from software activation. You can grow the plants fine, but the engineered traits require chemical activation, thus enforcing annual license fees from farmers.. Because genetically engineered seeds are patented, the seed company can maintain strict control over how the seeds are used.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8565357787050294355-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8565357787050294355-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1585386215361953487\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. HE HOPES TO GET THE NOBEL PRIZE SOON.. ALREADY HE IS \"CHAMPION OF EARTH\" FOR HIS SLIMY EFFORTS TOWARDS MOTHBALLING INDIAN COAL..<br />\n<br />\nIN A SCHOOL DEBATE WHEN I WAS 12 YEARS OLD, I TALKED ABOUT IR8 RICE AND CALLED IT A CONSPIRACY. NOT EVEN ONE SOUL IN THE HALL HEARD ABOUT IR8 RICE..<br />\n<br />\nThe taste and texture of the rice. IR8 was chalky and hardened after cooking: it may have been plentiful, but it wasn't nutritious or palatable.<br />\n<br />\nI COMMANDED SHIPS WITH FILIPINO CREW.. I HAVE TRIED A DELIBERATE EXPERIMENT\u2014JUST WITHHOLD RICE\u2014 AND THE FILIPINOS GET BRAIN FOGGY AND PANICKY..<br />\n<br />\nREASON?<br />\n<br />\nTHE USELESS GREEN REVOLUTION RICE WHICH WAS SHOVED DOWN THE THROATS OF PHILLIPINES.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">FOOD MUST NEVER GIVE \"WITHDRAWAL SYMPTOMS\"..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS PLANET MUST GO BACK TO ORGANIC AGRICULTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c1585386215361953487-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1322674972773554399\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c848436323467207348\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255695582#c848436323467207348\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://twitter.com/mkatju/status/1012424805239349249<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MORON IS BACK ON SOCIAL MEDIA AFTER A HIATUS..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5 HUMPED COWS IN ONE ACRE OF LAND CAUSED INDIAs TOP SOIL TO BECOME SIX FEET DEEP AND HOLY --PRODUCING FOOD WITH GOLDEN MEAN ( 1.618 ) INHERENT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWITH GREEN REVLUTION OF DESH DROHI MS SWAMINATHAN AND RAMPANT USES OF ARTIFICIAL FERTLISERS --NOW OUR TOP SOIL IS JUST A FEW INCHES THICK--IT IS THIRST FOR WATER AND PRODUCED FOOD WHICH CAUSES DISEASES.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">90% OF HUMAN DISEASES ORIGINATE IN THE HUMAN GUT AS PER 6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThink of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026\u2026</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus\u2026\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nHumus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter..<br />\n<br />\nCOMPOST IS NOT HUMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi)\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nDuring the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026 Priceless snake grove soil was the BANK FOR AYURVEDIC HERBS ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026 Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nBetter soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026 Humus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWhile these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_66T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1413190284692248433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255759317#c1413190284692248433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. .<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND HIS MINISTERS MORE THAN 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?..<br />\n<br />\nMODI GIVES US MORE AND MORE JAANKARI ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEKDAR ..<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY MODI WAS RECITING SOME KABIRDAS SHLOKA (&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>HOY KOY SHIT</b></span>&nbsp;) ..<br />\n<br />\nKABIRDAS NEVER EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "131", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3551024225425296544/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3231232698021364030", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-05-10T09:33:00+05:30", "updated": "2012-05-12T07:21:17+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzM2Nzg3NDc3MDU5Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/stress-killed-fat-cat-meow-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3231232698021364030", "title": "STRESS KILLED FAT CAT MEOW - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sUJKbsXydeg/T6s9Jn7yvKI/AAAAAAAAK6I/OfMwXvgQxkM/s1600/fat-cat-3_1497254a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"223\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sUJKbsXydeg/T6s9Jn7yvKI/AAAAAAAAK6I/OfMwXvgQxkM/s320/fat-cat-3_1497254a.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<strong>LOSS OF COMFORT ZONE KILLED FAT CAT MEOW-&nbsp; CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</strong><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMy younger son is upset. For the past several days , he was&nbsp;monitoring the happenings in fat cat's life.<br />\n<br />\nWe have 3 cats and hence you can safely assume that we know a bit about cats.<br />\n<br />\nThe 18 kilo cat hit world headlines after it came on American TV shows.<br />\n<br />\nThe 2 year old Meow's 87 year old owner put it up in an animal&nbsp;shelter. <br />\n<br />\nThis cat was USED to gain publicity and acceptance for \"healthy\" branded&nbsp;cat foods. He lost 1 kilo quite fast.<br />\n<br />\nCats eat only what they want. They do NOT live to eat like human beings.<br />\n<br />\nThe poor guy was made to walk up the stairs and put on a strange crash diet. <br />\n<br />\nHis body went into shock and the first sign of acute distress is wheezing.<br />\n<br />\nCats get extremely stressed when they lose their comfort zone. <br />\n<br />\nHere Meow lost his&nbsp;home. He was paraded around, under constant glare and was handled and petted by&nbsp;strangers .<br />\n<br />\nCat owners will tell you never to make a cat insecure. The first sign is they start urinating to mark its territory. <br />\n<br />\nThis is the way its DNA blue print has been programmed by God. Have you seen, a kitten digging a hole for a crap and then covering it up? <br />\n<br />\nWhen a cat is sick it wants to be left alone, as it wants to conserve energy . <br />\n<br />\nIt will NOT eat or drink water. This is NOT the time to force-feed slimmers, or force -exercise the poor guy.<br />\n<br />\nOwning a cat is a good forerunner for marriage, for it will do everything including doling out affection, on its own sweet time table. <br />\n<br />\nCats have absolute emotional honesty . A cat is NOT a hypocrite.<br />\n<br />\nIf you are worthy of affection a cat will be your friend,but never your slave. A cat has no use or need for society. <br />\n<br />\nThe purity of a person's heart can be quickly guaged by the way they regard cats. Dog owners demanding unconditional love, will never ever understand this.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><strong>SOCIETY , HUNGRY FOR PETTY PUBLICITY , KILLED MEOW, THE FAT CAT.</strong></span><br />\n<br />\nRIP, my friend !!&nbsp; <br />\n<br />\nHere is a 8000 year old vedic Sanskrit chant for you--<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/2UznXMCDH3k/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/2UznXMCDH3k&fs=1&source=uds\" />\n\n\n\n<param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" />\n\n\n\n<embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/2UznXMCDH3k&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"180\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qm5Xp4OEjd8/T6t0NV1aEvI/AAAAAAAAK6w/3IXqQg4ZxKI/s200/burning_flame.gif\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DMQsFylqIAw/T6s8GkTT6qI/AAAAAAAAK6A/NmvbYesMIVE/s1600/SAM_4731.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"65\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DMQsFylqIAw/T6s8GkTT6qI/AAAAAAAAK6A/NmvbYesMIVE/s200/SAM_4731.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "9", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3231232698021364030/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "6402649241419092371", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-05-09T20:17:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-08-23T14:12:02+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTM1MDEzNzIyMjIzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/wall-wash-ptt-without-tears-chemical.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6402649241419092371", "title": "WALL WASH PTT WITHOUT TEARS , CHEMICAL TANKERS-  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vl0U5VmeCIg/T6qCQCmDUSI/AAAAAAAAK5I/nxpHtqrHWdA/s1600/imagesCA0O0WVC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vl0U5VmeCIg/T6qCQCmDUSI/AAAAAAAAK5I/nxpHtqrHWdA/s1600/imagesCA0O0WVC.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<strong><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WALL WASH PTT WITHOUT TEARS , CHEMICAL TANKERS-&nbsp; CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></strong><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">This post must be read in conjunction with my post\nPOTASSIUM PERMANGANATE ON CHEMICAL TANKERS dated 9th Dec 2010.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nA hardcore chemical man will NOT surrender all his\nsecrets to all and sundry. So when I wrote the CHEMICAL TANKER HANDBOOK for my\ncompany, I told the MD, that I will just be writing 40% of what I know. </div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSeeing his crestfallen face , I told him-- be\ngrateful that you get the 40%. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>The rest\n60% is only for people who sail with me , and those who are worth it.</div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nI just got off a ship at a middle east country. We\nhad to load methanol with wall wash test specs of --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nHydrocarbons/ NIL</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nChlorides/ &lt; 2 ppm</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nPTT test/ &gt; 60minutes</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nColour/ clear</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nNow, I have never ever failed a tank inspection or WWT\nor first foot in my life. </div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThis loading was mission impossible , as the\nprevious 5 cargoes were insoluble in water , heavy HC cargoes as follows\u2014I just\ntook it as a personal challenge.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nLast- Bright stock base lub oils and SN600 lubes</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n2nd last-Palmoil derivatives like high MP Stearic\nacid, Fatty acids, Methyl esters</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n3<sup>rd</sup> last \u2013Xylene <br />\n4<sup>th</sup> last \u2013 Palm oil fatty acids</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n5<sup>th</sup> last- Annex 1 Diesel oils with Low Sulphur lub additives</div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nI was NOT too bothered when the shore lab failed 5\nof my tanks for first foot PTT. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; 21</span> tanks\npassed.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\nI called the lab boss into the CCR . I gave them a\nchance -- take fresh samples ( without loading a Texas/ Patiala foot ) and do\nit again. </div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nI gave away one of my ( balance 60% ) secrets\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<em>listen lab buddies , I have recirculated a\nstrong oxidizer cold dilute Nitric acid in all my stainless steel tanks. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>I could have done it with Sodium Hypochlorite\ntoo, for I have 600 litres of it on board. </em></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<em>But you naive guys will fail my chloride test ,\nthough there will be NIL chlorides in the tanks, and you will read the free\niron set of by hypochlorite as hydrocarbons.</em></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<em>The laws of pure chemistry are failing here. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Dont any of you guys know any fuc#ing chemistry\nto save your own dang jobs? I <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>suggest\nyou use fresh glassware , prepare a fresh PTT solution and retest</em>.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSo they got frightened , tripped over their heels ,\nran back with their tails between their legs , and did it again -- and this\ntime around they failed just 3 tanks.&nbsp; Warning--never dare to speak this way to\nthe shore lab, unless you are good enough.</div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nMy Peruvian Chief officer came to my cabin\ncrestfallen. </div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nI asked him \" XXX, do I look worried to you ?\"</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSo then I called in the P&amp;I club ( UK based )\nand did my own test with the P&amp;I expert as the witness.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nTo cut a long story short-- finally the shore lab\npassed all 26 tanks. The shore lab was disgraced. </div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThis lab will be vetted soon, heads will roll.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThe mistake they made was by using contaminated\nglass ware. </div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nTheir ignorance was they were comparing the ship's\nmethanol wash nessler tubes against a prepared START standard solution with LAB\nMathanol . They should have been comparing it with with the END standard\nsolution of Platinum Cobalt or Uranyl Nitrate which is STRAW YELLOW is colour.</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bqWLQuOD3Xg/T6p-JTY9zUI/AAAAAAAAK4w/ttHeuFZIut8/s1600/vv.JPG.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bqWLQuOD3Xg/T6p-JTY9zUI/AAAAAAAAK4w/ttHeuFZIut8/s1600/vv.JPG.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nHere is some blow by blow correspondence. It will be\na thriller for a Chemical tanker man. </div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nWarning : Young masters suggest you,don\u2019t use my hardcore email\nstyle and get sliced by a blade and bled to slow death <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>by your squeamish owners , managers and charterers . </span>keep in in dark place at 15 deg C.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 18pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot;;\">2) not\nwashing the glass ware with CONCENTRATED Hydrochloric acid of some previous\nreduced manganese di oxide clingage on some other ship.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 18pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot;;\">the failed\ntime is 36 minutes \u2013 in my opinion it should run for at least 90 minutes\u2014 at\nleast 30 minutes more than the passing time.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>such is the nature of strong oxidiser nitric acid.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">forget past practice set\nup by \u201cgrease and tackle \u201c guys&nbsp; who cannot write , leave alone balance ,\na simple chemical equation\u2014 yet behave as if they &nbsp;are the SHAKESPEARES of\nchemistry. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">ready to be erudite?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">here are the WWT specs you\ngave me for methanol -- Spec </span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">Clor 1 ppm,\n&nbsp;60m ptt, &nbsp;NIL HC</span><span style=\"color: #1f497d;\">.&nbsp; </span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">our last 5 cargoes are\ninsoluble in water with VERY high hydrocarbons. &nbsp;&nbsp;leaving tanks\nwashed to water white standard has left plenty of NVM ( non volatile matter )\non bulkheads and corrugations.&nbsp; for our tanks have onlty two fixed\nmachines at very high level, leaving plenty of blind and shadow sectors.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">last 5 --&nbsp; heavy\nviscous lubes\u2014palm oil derivatives\u2014xylene\u2014palm oil derivatives\u2014low sulphur\ndiesel/ jet fuel </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">the previous cargo mineral\nlub oils are dyed and has additives.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">at XXX with squeamish\nlab technicians, who test HC with 1:1 ratio of methanol and distilled\nwater\u2014passing HC test for NIL result is a task.&nbsp; it is either pass or\nfail. methanol is very sensitive to heavy lub oils as last cargo.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">now passing chloride test\nfor 1ppm \u2013is NO a problem unless you use CHLORINATED shore fresh water to rinse\n/ steam. &nbsp;&nbsp;or use sodium hypochlorite ( which is a regular in FCC tankcleaning\nchemical goodies along with causic soda ) to bleach out dyes and remove\nodour.&nbsp; </span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">on my stainless steel\nships I do NOT allow sodium hypochlorite, which rusts SS and denudes the\nchromic oxide layer. when the passive angstrom thin chromic oxide layer is\ndenuded FREE IRON is produced which show up as HC in a wall wash test, whether\nHC are determined by lab regents , or by mass spectrometer.&nbsp; SS ships with\n2mm thick clad steel of SUS316L do NOT carry sodium hypochlorite as\ncargo.&nbsp; to handle this chemical you need SUS316LN or SUS317L.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">THE BIGGEST HURDLE IS THE\n60 MINUTE PTT TEST\u2014WHICH WILL BE ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE IF DYED LUBES ARE THE LAST\nCARGO WITH VERY HIGH BP. &nbsp;&nbsp;at the most we can get 30 minutes, before\nthe color of solution changes from purple pink to straw yellow..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 115%;\">KmNO4 (\npotassium permanganate ) does NOT care for hydrocarbons or chlorides. It hunts\nfor REDUCING matter</span></b><span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">\u2014like\ndye used in lubes and additives/ sediments &nbsp;which have high BP and remain\nas NVM.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">this is where OXIDISING\nchemical NITRIC ACID comes in as a tankcleaning chemical.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">if reducer is yin, an\noxidiser is yang\u2014the pole opposite which consumes it.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">after a rinse with dilute\nnitric acid\u2014 KmNO4 has NIL reducing matter to hunt for. &nbsp;and if the shore\nlab plays dirty with PTT test , we know where to kick them hard. &nbsp;most of\nthe time it is ignorance \u2013 as the potlife of KmNO4 solution is very little.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">RUST REMOVER which you\ndole out in plenty can remove the white sediments self inflicted by caustic\nsoda\u2014 but it is no nitric acid. &nbsp;nitric acid dissolves free iron ( NVM )\nbetter.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">the nice silver spoon\nshine of tank bulkheads by using phosphoric acid rust remover means NOTHING.\n&nbsp;the passive chromic acid angstrom thin layer is INVISIBLE. &nbsp;healthy\naustenetic stainless steel does NOT shine\u2014rather it has a dull grey\nappearance\u2014surprised?.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">most importantly nitric\nacid decomposes sodium salts which form precipitate with AgNO3 ( silver nitrate\n) and interferes with the lab tests.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 115%;\">BOTTOM\nLINE: &nbsp;\u201cOXIDISING\u201d NITRIC ACID IS USED AS AN INSTRUMENT TO PASS WALL WASH,\n&nbsp;AND TO MAKE THE ROGUES WHO PLAY AROUND WITH THE \u201cREDUCER HUNTING PTT\nTEST\u201d IMPOTENT. </span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 115%;\">-- as an\nadded incentive it puts a tiny metal flap on all tiny pitting holes, which can\nbe quite huge under the surface.&nbsp; and of course we all know that it makes\nthe tank smooth by building up the chromic passive layer.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri;\">thanks and best regards</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri;\">capt. ajit vadakayil</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri;\">master</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #1f497d; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri;\">mt XXXX</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1I3tqclDC6Q/T6qC6wDQN6I/AAAAAAAAK5Q/AAMr8uP2mJ8/s1600/SAM_3672.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1I3tqclDC6Q/T6qC6wDQN6I/AAAAAAAAK5Q/AAMr8uP2mJ8/s400/SAM_3672.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;;\">\n\n</span></div>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">The tank wall washed methanol is inside the <span style=\"color: red;\">middle </span>tube--refer to the pciture above. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">Initially at ZERO time it will be of same purple\npink colour of the <span style=\"color: red;\">left</span> side tube, which\ncontains pure<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>methanol. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">Left and middle tubes contain 50 cc methanol plus\n2 cc KmNO4 solution (0.02%)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">The tube at the <span style=\"color: red;\">right </span>contains\nthe straw yellow standard color solution\u2014which is platinum cobalt / Uranyl\nnitrate . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">When the <span style=\"color: red;\">middle tube</span>\nchanges its color from <span style=\"color: red;\">left</span> hand tube colour (\nSTART POINT ) <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>to to the <span style=\"color: red;\">right</span> hand tube color ( STOP POINT ) \u2014the time is\nnoted. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">It is so simple.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>You are just comparing. You cant make a mistake. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">The background must be white and preferably the\nroom must have white flourescent light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; line-height: 115%;\">Our PTT test should have run for more than 120\nminutes.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>Just 60 min is pass.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; <br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\">Test for chief engineers who agree\nto join ships without electrical officer-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 11pt; mso-highlight: yellow;\">&gt;50% marks -- Can be posted on a ship &lt;10 years old without\nelectrical officer</span><span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; genarator is\nAVR<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>controlled,<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>voltage will:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">b)Initially rise,\nthen reset to the set value</span><span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: What would\nyou do first?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: switchboard<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" alternator when\nparalleling two alternators?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">b)In none of the\nmentioned alternatives<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\">c)With the pointer\nof the synchronoscope at 0\u00b0 (<st1:time hour=\"12\" minute=\"0\" w:st=\"on\">12\n O'clock</st1:time>) and both synchronizing lamps dark (off</span><span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span no.1 and\nno.2 alternators running in parallel and the kW loads equally shared, one\nalternator is drawing much higher current than the other. What does this\nindicate?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">a)Alternator\nfrequencies are different and should be adjusted on the governor speed\ncontrollers<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">b)Alternators are\nout of phase and should be tripped and paralleled again<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">c)One alternator\nhas lost one of its phases<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">d)The alternators\nare not generating the same voltages and should be adjusted on automatic\nvoltage regulator rheostats<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The first step is to:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">a)Remove the load\nfrom the alternator to be stopped<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">b)Make sure the\nload is evenly shared<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">c)Trip the main\ncircuit breaker<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">d)Increase the\nfrequency on the switchboard<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; This would indicate:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">a)The frequency of\nthe incoming alternator is the same as that of the main switchboard<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">b)The\nsynchronoscope is not functioning properly and should be checked<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">c)The voltage of\nthe incoming alternator is the same as that of the main switchboard<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"color: black;\">d)The incoming\nalternator is in phase with the switchboard, but the frequency is not the same<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Should you:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 11pt;\"><span regulator<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: black;\"><br
