style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ODMCS PRACTICAL OPERATION WITHOUT TEARS<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">CLEANTRACK 1000 -- BRANNSTROM\nSWEDEN\u2014 the MOST reliable and popular model at sea<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNO ANNEX 1 SLOPS CAN BE DISCHARGED\nOVERBOARD UNLESS IT IS PASSED THROUGH THE ODMCS. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>ODMCS IS DESIGNED TO KEEP A CONTINIOUS RECORD\nOF THE DISCHARGES. THE RECORD OF PAST 3 YEARS SHALL BE RETAINED FOR ANY SHORE\nINPECTOR TO EXAMINE. OUR SET DOES NOT HAVE A PRINTER \u2013HOWEVER IT HAS A LARGE\nELECTRONIC MEMORY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nOUR CLEAN TRACK 1000 ODMCS HAS A\nUNIQUE SELF CLEANING FEATURE WHICH MAKES MANUAL CLEANING UNNECCESARY\u2014 <span style=\"color: blue;\">BUT IT CANNOT HANDLE HEAVY BLACK OIL AS THERE IS NO SOAP\nSOLUTION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nYOU CAN SELECT THE TYPE OF ANNEX 1\nOIL OR SELECT THE DENSITY/ VISCOSITY/ POUR POINT FOR PRODUCTS\u2014AS PER THE\nTABLE<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>OR FOR ANNEX 2 OILS. (2.2 ). LUB\nOIL IS TYPE 4---HFO IS TYPE 6---KEROSENE IS FOR JET FUEL ETC<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nAT THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW BALLAST\nVOYAGE CANCEL THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF OIL DISCHARGED DURING PREVIOUS VOYAGE<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>AND ENTER THE NEW LIMIT OF 1/30000 OF THE\nTOTAL QUANTITY OF THE PARTICULAR CARGO CONVERTED TO LITRES.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHERE IS A GPS INPUT INTO THE ODME.\nIF YOU PUT OFF THE GPS, IT SHOWS A GPS RECEIVER TIME OUT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSO THE INPUTS TO THE FORMULA FOR\nIRD --MAX 30 LITRES / NM \u2014 LIKE PPM, CUM/HR, KNOTS ARE ALL ON AUTO. MANUAL\nOVERRIDE MUST BE USED ONLY IN EMERGENCY. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nIRD IN LTRS/NM= PPM X CUM PER HOUR/\nKNOTS X 1000.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nLINES WITH \u2018I\u2019 ARE THE ONES WHICH\nWILL ALLOW MANUAL INPUTS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nCHIEF OFFICER MUST BE A WIZARD ON\nTHE LCD INPUTS AND FUNCTION KEYS \u2013OR YOU CUT A SORRY FIGURE IN FRONT OF A PORT\nSTATE CONTROL INSPECTOR , WHO WILL NOW START EXPLOITING YOUR VULNERABILTY\u2014AND\nTHEN IF THE SHIP GETS A DEFICIENCY CITATION <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>YOU HAVE NOBODY TO BLAME BUT YOURSELF.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE MESSAGE IS-- BE VERY FAMILIAR\nWITH THE CPU FEED PAGES/LINES .<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>NOTHING\nBIG IN THIS--- <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">STEP \u2013INS\u2014ALT\u2014PUNCH\nNUMBER---RET</b>\u2014ARROW UP/ DOWN<span style=\"color: blue;\">. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>AFTER INS IS PRESSED INFO ON LCD THAT CAN BE\nCHANGED WILL FLICKER. A CURSOR SHOWS THE POSITION WHERE THE NEXT CHARACTER WILL\nTURN UP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<ul style=\"margin-top: 0in;\" type=\"disc\">\n<li class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: blue; line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;\">AFTER INPUT PRESS <u>RETURN</u> TO ENTER OR ACCEPT\n     THE DATA.<o:p></o:p></li>\n<li class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: blue; line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;\">ALARM AND WARNING OUTPUTS ARE ACTIVATED WHILST THE <u>RESET</u>\n     KEY IS ACTIVATED.<o:p></o:p></li>\n<li class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: blue; line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;\">USE <u>STEP</u> TO CHANGE BETWEEN OPERATION MODES\n     AUTO/ MANUAL.<o:p></o:p></li>\n<li class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: blue; line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;\">AN <u>INSERT</u> KEY MUST PRECEDE CHARACTERS IN ORDER\n     TO BE ACCEPTED. <o:p></o:p></li>\n<li class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: blue; line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;\"><u>ALT</u> HAS TO BE PRESSED WHEN NUMBERS ARE KEYED\n     IN.<o:p></o:p></li>\n</ul>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nODME IS USED ONLY TO DECANT THE\nSLOPS. YOU CANNOT DECANT SLOPS IN SPECIAL AREAS OF ANNEX 1 , WHEN YOU ARE LESS\nTHAN 50 NM FROM NEAREST LAND OR WHEN YOU ARE NOT ENROUTE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE OVERBOARD PNUEMATIC VALVE WILL\nSLAM SHUT IF THERE IS\u2014<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nPOWER FAILURE OR YOU PUT THE\nINSTRUMENT OFF<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSAMPLE LOSS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSENSOR CAPACITY GETTING EXCEEDED<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nFAILURE OF MEASURING RECORDING\nSYSTEM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHUMB RULE: IF THE OVERBOARD SLAMS\nSHUT FIRST REDUCE THE RATE \u2013IT SHOULD NOW OPEN. IF NOT THEN ALLOW THE MIXTURE\nIN SLOP TANK TO SETTLE AND LATER DECANT AT A REDUCED FLOW RATE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">OPERATING PROCEDURE:<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nPUT ON THE POWER 440V FOR SAMPLE PP\nAND 220V FOR CPU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON DECK:<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nOPEN ANNEX 1 MANUAL OVERBOARD VALVE\n(USUALLY LOCKED ) ON PORT SIDE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSET THE LINE TO PUMP DECANTED SLOPS\nOVERBOARD USING FRAMO PUMP\u2014DON\u2019T START THE FRAMO PUMP YET.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSET THE LINE FOR SLOP TO RECEIVE\nODME REJECTED CONTENTS. . THE PNUEMATIC VALVE IS ALWAYS OPEN IF THE PNUEMATIC\nOVERBOARD VALVE IS SHUT\u2014THEY WORK IN TANDEM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><u>IN ENG ROOM:--<o:p></o:p></u></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nCHECK THE LEVEL OF LUB OIL (TURBINE\nOIL #90 ) ON TOP OF THE SAMPLING PUMP BULKHEAD SEAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nOPEN AIR ( 4.7 TO 7 BARS RANGE ),\nFRESH WATER (4 KG ) <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>VALVES IN THE ENGINE\nROOM.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>ALL VALVES ARE NUMBERED AND FLOW\nARROW DIRECTIONS ARE MARKED PROPERLY. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><u>IN TC PUMPROOM:<o:p></o:p></u></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE ANALYSING UNIT IS SITUATED IN\nTHE PUMPROOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE FRESH WATER VALVES MUST BE SHUT..\nTHEY ARE ONLY FOR FILLING UP THE LINES INITIALLY--<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>AFTER WHICH THE DRAIN OF THE AU MUST BE SHUT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nON THE PNUEMATIC FLOW METER OPEN\nTHE DPT VALVES ( 2NOS ) AND KEEP THE CENTRE EQUALISING VALVE SHUT. (1.4 KG AIR\n)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nOPEN THE DECANTED SAMPLE INLET AND\nOUTLET VALVES.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>OPEN THE AU DRAIN TILL\nTHE WATER COMES OUT AND THEN SHUT IT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><u>IN THE CCR:<o:p></o:p></u></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE COMPUTER PROGRAMMING UNIT CPU\nIS SITUATED HERE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">FUNCTION KEYS:<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">INS</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>INSERT ---TO PREPARE\nFOR SELECTION USING CURSOR to change inputs. Character writing 0 to 9 dot and\ndash , is accepted only after pressing.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">HORIZONTAL ARROW</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>TO MOVE THE\nCURSOR RIGHT OR LEFT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">VERTICAL ARROW</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>TO MOVE THE\nLINE DOWN OR UP<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">RET</b>/<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>ENTER KEY. Termination <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">CHR</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>CHARACTERLESS KEY\n(OOPS !)\u2014IT JUST MEANS IT DOES NOT HAVE A FUNCTION.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">RESET</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>TO STOP BUZZER <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>OR ERASE /RESET OLD ALARMS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ALT</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>TO USE ALTERNATE\nFUNCTION \u2013NUMBERS INPUT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">STEP</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>TO SELECT OR TO\nCHANGE<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>A/M <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">PF</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>PAPER FEED <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">AV</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>ANALYSING VALVE\u2014PRESS\nIT TO OPEN/ SHUT ( for manual cleaning of AU )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">PG UP</b>/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>PAGE UP KEY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">PG DN</b>/<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>PAGE DOWN KEY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">CLN</b>/<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>SYSTEM FLUSHING START -\nSTOP KEY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ODM</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\">/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>ODME START STOP KEY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSTV LAMP LIGHT/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>SLOP TANK VALVE OPEN ( YOU CAN SEE POSITION\nOF OVERBOAD AND SLOP BYPASS VALVES ON THE LCD DIAGRAM )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nOBV LAMP LIGHT/ <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>OVERBOARD VALVE OPEN<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">MANUAL OVERRIDE KEY</b> / <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>TO DO\nMANUAL OPERATIONS IN CASE OF FAILURE AND WHEN OVERBOARD DISCHARGE IS NECESSARY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nIMPORTANT<span style=\"color: blue;\">:<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>KEEP THE FLOW RATE LOW AT 200 CUM/ HR</span>.\nTHE ODME IS ONLY TO DECANT\u2014OUTSIDE SPL AREA, -NOT TO PUMP TANKWASHING\nSTRIPPINGS DIRECTLY OVERBOARD.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nPUT ON THE POWER OF THE CPU. THE\nPRINTER STARTS WORKING IMMEDIATELY. ENSURE THE PRINTER PAPER IS SUFFICIENT FOR\nTHE WHOLE INTENDED OPERATION. RESET THE PRINTOUT COUNTER BY PRESSING <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">RET.<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nPRESS MODE KEY TO CHOOSE OPERATOR\nMODE OR PRESS PAGE DOWN KEY TILL THE DISPLAY SHOWS PAGE PROGRAMMING.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 2.1</b>- SELECT SAMPLE POINT BY \u2013<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">STEP</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\">\u2014 SELECT\n( CHANGE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">INS</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\">\u2014<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>INSERT A VALUE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">RET</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\">\u2014ENTER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 2.2</b>--<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>SELECT CARGO\nTYPE SAY KEROSENE BY- ( Lub oil is oil type No4 )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nINS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nHORIZONTAL<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>ARROW-- TO SELECT ANOTHER TYPE SAY GASOLENE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nRET-- ENTER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 2.3</b> \u2013USE \u2018OIL DISCHG\u2019 MODE OF 30 LITRES / NM FOR CCR CARGO\nUSE . THE OTHER MODE OF \u201cOIL CONC\u201d IS FOR ENGINE ROOM BILGES USE OR FOR SBT\u2014WE\nDO NOT USE THIS . USE STEP TO CHANGE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 2.4</b>\u2014THE FLOW IS ON AUTO. YOU CAN CHANGE WITH STEP TO MANUAL\nMODE OF CUM/ HR. <span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN YOU ENTER A MANUAL FLOW RATE,\nTHE NUMBER WHICH SHOWS INSIDE BRACKETS IS THE AUTOMATICALLY RECD VALUE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 2.5</b>--<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>THE SHIP SPEED\nIS ON AUTO. YOU CAN CHANGE WITH STEP TO MANUAL MODE OF KNOTS. <span style=\"color: blue;\">THE NUMBER INSIDE BRACKET IS THE GPS VALUE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 2.6</b>--<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">TOTAL QUANTITY OF OIL THAT HAS BEEN DISCHG + TOTAL QUANTITY\nOF OIL ALARM LIMIT ( WHICH IS TO BE ENTERED AT 1/ 30000 OF QUANTITY OF <u>CARGO\nDISCHARGED )</u>.</span><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>THE TOTAL\nAMOUNT OF OIL DISCHARGED IN LITRES OVERBOARD IN THE PREVIOUS VOYAGE CAN BE CANCELLED\nBY 00000<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>AND PRESSING RET KEY. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">RESET IS ALLOWED ONLY\nAT THE BEGINNING OF A NEW BALLAST VOYAGE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">ADJUST\nWARNING LIMITS IN <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">LINE 2.7</b>.\u2014 YOU CAN\nCHOOSE A WARNING LIMIT OF SAY 25 LITRES PER NM \u2013THIS ALLOWS YOU TO SLOW DOWN\nTHE PUMP AND GET SOME MORE SLOP WATER UNDER THE OIL LAYER OUT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 4.1</b>\u2014INPUT THE MIN AND MAX FLOW RATES IN CUM/ HR. ON FAIRCHEM\nYUKA THE RATES ARE 50 AND 200 CUM /HR<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNOW PRESS PAGE UP 3 TIMES AND COME\nTO \u2013<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">LINE 1.2</b>\u2014 ENSURE GPS IS ON AUTO BY USING STEP TO CHANGE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">ON LINE 1.3</b>--<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>KEEP THE OIL\nCONC IN AUTO MODE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNOW PRESS UP ARROW TWICE AND COME\nTO HEADLINE <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">PAGE 1.1</b> \u2013CHECK IF ALL\nARE ON AUTO\u2014<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nOC/ PPM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nFLOW/ CUM/HR<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nLITRES/NM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSPD/ KNOTS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nGPS/<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>AUTO<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nKEEP AN EYE ON THIS DISPLAY DURING\nDECANTING OPERATIONS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nIF YOU PUT THE GPS TO MANUAL IT IS\nONLY FOR ONE HOUR\u2014AFTER THAT IT WILL GO BACK TO AUTO.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNOW GO TO <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">LINE 6.1</b> AND CHECK THE FW PRESSURE IN ANALYSING UNIT. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>THE DISPLAY SHOULD BE CLOSE WATER WITH STEP (\nIF THE WATER IS OPEN VIA SOLENOID VALVE ). <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>IF NOT THEN OPEN WATER WITH STEP. THE PRESSURE\nMUST SHOW 2 BARS MINIMUM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nBY PRESSING <span style=\"color: red;\">ODM</span> KEY THE ODME STARTS.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>THE\nFRAMO PUMPING RATE OR FLOW RATE IN CUM/ HR WILL BE DISPLAYED ON THE HEADLINE\nPAGE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE OBV KEY LED LIGHTS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE OVERBOARD VALVE OPENS AFTER ONE\nMINUTE \u2013THIS CAUSES THE OBV OPEN LIGHT TO COME ON AND SIMNULTANEOUSLY THE STV\nOPEN LIGHT GOES OFF.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nFOR STOPPING ODME PRES OBV AGAIN. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNOW THEN <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">OBV</b> LED LIGHT GOES OFF AND THE LED ON THE <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">CLN</b> KEY COMES ON. IMMEDIATELY THE OVERBOARD SHUTS AND THE SLOP\nVALVE OPENS---OR <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">OBV OPEN</b> LED GOES\nOFF AND THE <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">STV OPEN</b> LED COMES ON. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE SAMPLING LINE IS NOW FLUSHED\nFORWARD AND BACKWARDS 3 TIMES IN 2 MINUTES AND STOPS AUTOMATICALLY.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>THEN THE <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">CLN</b>\nKEY LED GOES OFF.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nPUT OFF THE FRAMO PUMP. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNOW GO AND SHUT ALL THE VALVES OF\nAIR, FW YOU OPENED IN E/R.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSHUT ALL THE VALVES YOU OPENED IN\nPUMPROOM. KEEP ONLY THE DPT EQUALISER VALVE ( MIDDLE ) OPEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSHUT OFF ALL VALVES ON DECK YOU\nOPENED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nSHUT OFF THE POWER TO THE\nCONVERTING UNIT IN E/R AND THE CPU IN CCR. IF THE CPU POWER IS ON AND THE CU\nPOWER IS OFF THEN AN ALARM COMES\u2014ALARM COMMUNICATION ERROR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">SIMULATION TESTS</b>:- <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nYOU CAN DO ELECTRONIC SIMULATION BY\nENTERING <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">MANUAL\nPARAMETERS</span></b> FOR SPEED, FLOW RATE AND PPM.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>KEEP THE FLOW RATE AT 200 CUM/ HR.--<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>IF YOU GO AT HIGH OR VERY LOW RATES <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>THERE WILL BE ALARM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nREMEMBER THE OVERBOARD PNEUMATIC\nVALVE WILL OPEN\u2014SO MAKE SURE THE MANUAL OVERBOARD VALVE IS SHUT <span style=\"color: blue;\">TO AVOID POLLUTION.\u2014AND MAKE SURE THIS LINE IS FILLED WITH\nWATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n1) SET FLOW RATE TO THE 200 CUM/\nHR. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>SPEED TO 5 KNOTS AND THE PPM TO 350.\nTHE IRD IS NOW 14 LITRES/ NM.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>THE\nOVERBOARD IS OPEN AND THE SLOP BYPASS IS SHUT. NOW INCREASE THE PPM MANUALLY TO\n650 PPM WHICH MAKES THE IRD 26 LITRES/ NM\u2014THERE WILL BE A WARNING ALARM.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>NOW INCREASE THE PPM TO 800 PPM TO GET 32\nLITRES/NM. . THE OVERBOARD WILL NOW SLAM SHUT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n2) RESET THE \u201cTOTAL OIL DISCHARGED\nQUANTITY\u201d TO ZERO. NOW SET THE ALARM POINT TO A LOW 10 LITRES. THE OVERBOARD\nWILL SHUT SOON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n3) SHUT OFF THE SAMPLE FLOW TO AU\nTO TRIGGER SAMPLE LOSS ALARM. THE OVERBOARD WILL SHUT AND SLOP VALVE WILL OPEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n4) PUT OFF THE POWER SUPPLY. THE\nPOWER LOSS ALARM WILL TRIGGER. OVERBOARD WILL SHUT AND SLOP BYPASS WILL OPEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\">ODMCS\nprints every 10 min \u2013 also when alarm conditions develop, when normal\nconditions are restored, when the computed rate of discharge varies by 10 litres\na nautical mile, when the command is manual and when the dischg overboard\nstarts and stops. <o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\">Discharge\nautomatically stops -- when there is power failure , loss of sample, at 1/30000\nDWT ( cargo discharged ) ,<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>when IRD is\ngreater than 30 litres / nm., failure of measuring or recording system and if\ninput of any sensor exceeds the effective capacity of the system.<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<i style=\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal;\">Sample\nflow rate is 900 litres/ hr upto 65 deg c.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>Cleaning solution consumption 100 litres / hr<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">MAINTENANCE:<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nAN ODME TECHNICIAN COSTS MONEY.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>IF YOU DO YOUR JOB AND KNOW WHAT IT TAKES TO\nRUN A TROUBLE FREE ODME, WE CAN KEEP THE TECHNICIAN AWAY. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nTHE IR DETECTOR LINE 5.4 HAS 4\nVALUES IN %. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>WITH A DIRTY MEASURING CELL\nTHE FIRST VALUE WILL DROP &lt;85 % AND THE OTHER THREE WILL RISE &gt;50%.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>-THE FIRST VALUE (CLEANING LIMIT ) IS THE\nDIRECTLY TRANSMITTED LIGHT SIGNAL THROUGH THE SENSOR GLASS TUBE. IF THE SENSOR\nTUBE IS DIRTY THIS VALUE BECOMES LOW. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>2 3 AND 4 ARE CAUSED DUE TO AIR BUBBLES AND\nPARTICLES IN FW\u2014THESE CLEANING LIMITS MUST BE LOWER THAN 10%<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>SYSTEM CLEANING IS ACTIVATED IMMEDIATELY AND\nAUTOMATICALLY AFTER THE ALARM. IF THIS IS NOT ENOUGH YOU CAN PRESS CLN KEY AND\nCARRY OUT FURTHER MANUAL CLEANING.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>IF\nSTILL THERE IS NO IMPROVEMENT OPEN THE ANALYSING VALVE BY PRESSING AV KEY. SHUT\nTHE VALVE AT THE OUTLET OF AU. OPEN THE TOP PLUG AND USE THE LONG BRUSH IN THE\nTOOL BOX WITH CLEANING SOLUTION FOR SCRUBBING..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nPRECAUTIONS:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nIN COLD WEATHER DO NOT ALLOW FW TO\nFREEZE AND BREAK THE ODME.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\nNOTES:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* IF THE ALARM LIGHT FLICKERS IT\nMEANS THERE IS MORE THAN ONE ALARM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* THE SAMPLE WATER FLOW IS 900\nLITRES PER HOUR<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* FW CONSUMPTION IS 60 LTRS / HR\nDURING MEASURING AND 600 LTRS / HR DURING CLEANING<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* MANUAL FLOW CAN BE PROGRAMMED FOR\nSIMULATION<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* SCROLLING FAST \u2013SCROLL+ ALT<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* PF LED LIGHTS INTERMITTENTLY WHEN\nTHE SYSTEM IS IN MANUAL OIL CONC MODE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* AV FOR MANUAL CLEANING OF\nANALYSING UNIT.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* YOU CAN STOP AFTER CLEANING BY\nPRESSING CLN KEY\u2014NOT A WISE THING TO DO.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n* CLEANING ERROR CAN<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>BE CAUSED BY TEMPORARY TEST ( TOO SMALL HOSE\nPIPE CONNECTED TO SLOP LINE ) INSTEAD OF RUNNING THE HUGE SLOP PUMP OR EVEN A\nLEAKY ANALYSING VALVE OR LOW AIR PRESSURE WHICH CAUSE THE AV TO OPERATE\nSLOWLY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-42yyAlNQwPY/T6JZx97yZ4I/AAAAAAAAKpU/FzS8xnr4gJM/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"283\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-42yyAlNQwPY/T6JZx97yZ4I/AAAAAAAAKpU/FzS8xnr4gJM/s320/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "10", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2965458813843324644/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8558585192796906286", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-05-03T00:03:00+05:30", "updated": "2012-07-27T09:31:10+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzQzMzYxNjcwNDY5Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/ship-to-ship-transfer-operations-on.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8558585192796906286", "title": "SHIP TO SHIP TRANSFER OPERATIONS ON CHEMICAL TANKERS-  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; STS</span> TRANSFER OPERATIONS<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iLXfy6pVnDU/T6F9OAjs_LI/AAAAAAAAKo4/7U6RfqOHF-s/s1600/imagesCAQDHFXA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iLXfy6pVnDU/T6F9OAjs_LI/AAAAAAAAKo4/7U6RfqOHF-s/s400/imagesCAQDHFXA.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 42.55pt center 3.0in right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 42.55pt center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The STS transfer of chemical cargoes is\na common practice.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>Experience gained\nfrom these regular operations has proven that STS<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>transfers are safe, if proper procedures are\nobserved, in suitable weather and sea conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 42.55pt center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 42.55pt center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">In certain port areas it will be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>found that local regulations apply. These\nlocal regulations should be followed<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>and\nwhere appropriate the recommendations made in this procedure can be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>used as additional advice.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 42.55pt center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">ESTABLISH PERSON IN OVERALL CHARGE OF\nTHE STS OPERATION <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The overall control of an STS operation\nshould be vested in the hands of one<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>individual and will be either one of the Masters concerned, or an\nSTS<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>superintendent.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">If both Masters are unfamiliar with, or\ninexperienced in STS transfer operations then an STS superintendent must be\nemployed to assist ship\u2019s<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>masters in\nmooring and unmooring of the ships, and to co-ordinate and<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>supervise the entire ship-to-ship operation.\nThere are specialised<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>STS<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>agencies providing such services on an\ninternational basis.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">Master of the ship supposed to be\ninvolved in STS transfer operation has to inform the chemical operator in order\nto arrange necessary assistance. </span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; letter-spacing: -0.05pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\">M</span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">For all STS transfer operation Master remain responsible for\nthe safety of his<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>own ship, its crew,\ncargo and equipment and should not permit safety to be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>prejudiced by the actions of others. If\nanother ship fails to observe any of the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>safety requirements during the STS transfer operation, this should be\nbrought<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>to the attention of the Master\nof the another ship and operation should be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>suspended until the situation is rectified. </span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\">To<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">p</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\">r</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">o</span>te<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">ss</span>els<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.3pt;\"> </span>from<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\"> </span>d<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">a</span>ma<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">g</span>e,<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.4pt;\"> </span>f<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">e</span>nd<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">e</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\">r</span>s<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.3pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">m</span>u<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">s</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\"> </span>be of<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">s</span>uff<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">i</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>a<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">l</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">l</span>y<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.5pt;\"> </span>p<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">l</span>a<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>ed,<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.2pt;\"> </span>so as<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\"> </span>to:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; tab-stops: 111.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">1.a<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">b</span>s<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">o</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\">r</span>b<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.2pt;\"> </span>the<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\"> </span>i<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">m</span>pa<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.3pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">e</span>ne<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>gy<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.25pt;\"> </span>d<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">h</span>in<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">g</span>/un<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">b</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>th<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">i</span>ng<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; tab-stops: 111.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">2.<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">m</span>ai<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">n</span>ta<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">i</span>n<span mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Master of the ship involved in STS\ntransfer operation should ensure that the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>ships to be used are compatible in design and equipment and that\nmooring<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>operations, hose handling and\ncommunications can be conducted safely and<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>efficiently. The initial information will be supplied to the\norganisers<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>by the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>Master as per <b
