0in 0pt 1.5in; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Good communication between the ships is\nan essential requirement for<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>successful\ntransfer operations. A common language for communication should<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>be agreed before operations commence. If a\nserious language problem be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>detected,\nthen action should be taken<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>to resolve\nthis by transferring<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>an<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>experienced person from one ship to the other\nbefore operations begin.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The ships should establish initial\ncommunication as early as practicable to<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>plan operations and to confirm the transfer area.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">As the ships come into the transfer area,\ncontact should be established on the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>appropriate VHF channel at the earliest opportunity, thereafter\nswitching to a<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>mutually agreed working\nchannel. Approach, mooring and unmooring should<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>not be attempted until proper effective communication has been\nconfirmed<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>between two ships. At this\ntime, in accordance with the information<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>exchanged, <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">Check List 2 and 3</b>\nshould be satisfactory completed. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">If communication breakdown occurs\nduring an approach manoeuvre, if<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>appropriate and safe, the manoeuvre should be aborted and the\nsubsequent<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>actions taken by each ship\nshould be indicated by the appropriate sound<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>signals as prescribed in the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>IRPCS\n(colreg). <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">During cargo transfer operation,\nessential personnel on both ships should<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>have a reliable, common means of communication at all times, including a\nbackup system. Spare radios and batteries to be available on board. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The emergency signal should be agreed\nbetween both ships and this should<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>be a\nseries of short and rapid blasts on the ship whistle. It should be sounded<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>by either ship in an emergency or in case of\ncommunication breakdown during<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>cargo\noperations.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">In general, operations should not be\nresumed until satisfactory<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>communications have been re-established. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The lights and shapes to be shown, and\nthe sound signal made, during STS<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>transfer operations required by the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>International Regulations for Preventing<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>Collisions at Sea. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">MANOEUVERING\nALONGSIDE WITH TWO SHIPS UNDER POWER<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">One ship, normally the lager, maintain\nsteerage way at slow speed on a<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>constant\nheading. Normally the manoeuvre should be made with the wind<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>and sea ahead, however local conditions and\nknowledge may dictate an<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>alternative\nheading.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>It is recommended that the\nmanoeuvring ship<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>approaches and berths\nwith her port side to the starboard side of the constant<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>heading ship. The Master should always be\nprepared to abort a berthing<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>operations\nif necessary. The decision should be taken in ample time while the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>situation is still under control. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">A common method of berthing is for the\nmanoeuvring ship to approach the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>constant heading ship from the quarter on the side of berthing. On\ncloser<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>approach she should parallel the\ncourse of the constant heading ship, about<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>50 to 100 meters off. The manoeuvring ship should then position itself\nrelative<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>to the constant heading ship.\nContact is made by the manoeuvring ship<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>reducing the distance by appropriate rudder and engine movements until<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>fenders touch.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The two ships should preferably make\nparallel contact at the same speed with<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>no\nastern engine movements being necessary.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The effects of ship interaction should\nbe anticipated when manoeuvring at<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>close\nquarters. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">On completion of mooring, the constant\nheading ship will power all future<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>manoeuvres and, if a transfer at anchor is planned, will proceed to the\nagreed<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>anchoring position. During this\ntime the former manoeuvring ship will have its<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>engines stopped and rudder amidships. For this period the constant\nheading<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>ship should not use strong\nastern engine movements.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /><br />&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Depends upon ships size and weather\ncondition it should be decided whether<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>only constant heading ship will anchor or both ship. The constant\nheading<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>ship should use the anchor on\nthe side opposite that on witch the other ship is<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>moored. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /><br />&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Once at anchor, each ship is\nresponsible for keeping its own anchor watch. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">MANOEUVRING\nWITH ONE SHIP AT ANCHOR <o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">This manoeuvre can be preferred for\nmore constrained transfer area,<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>especially when tug assistance is available.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">A berthing operation should only be\ncarried out after the anchoring ship is<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>brought-up to her anchor and is lying on a steady heading with reference\nto<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>prevailing current and wind\nconditions.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">A careful watch should be kept on the\nheading of the anchored ship and the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>manoeuvring ship should be advised immediately by the anchored ship if\nshe<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>has any tendency to yaw. Where there\nis a tendency to yaw is excessively, a<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>tug should be employed to hold the anchored ship on a steady heading. If\nno<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>tug is available, postponement of the\noperation should be considered. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The manoeuvring ship approach and berth\nwith<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>her port side to the starboard<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>side of the other ship. When approaching the\nship at anchor the wider angle<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>of\napproach than that adopted for manoeuvres underway is recommended. A<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>wider angle of approach helps to avoid early\nship to ship contact in cases<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>where the\nanchored ship might yaw unexpectedly.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">When mooring to an anchored vessel care\nshould be taken not to pull the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>anchored\nvessel quickly towards the mooring vessel.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">HOSE\nHANDLING AND CARGO TRANSFER OPERATIONS<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">When two ships are securely moored the\npre-transfer <b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">Check List 4</b> should\nbe<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>satisfactory completed. In addition<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\">, Ship/Shore Safety Check List</b> to\nbe<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>completed as well. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Cargo transfer operations should be\ncarried with the requirements of the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>receiving ship. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The cargo transfer operation should be\nplanned and agreed in written<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>between\nthe two vessels and should include information on the following<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>where applicable:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">quantity of each grade of cargo <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">sequence of grade<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">cargo density and temperature<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">number of pumps, maximum pressure<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">cargo heating requirements<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">initial, maximum and topping off rate<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">notice of rate change and transfer shut\ndown procedures<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">emergency and spill containment\nprocedures<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">watch or shift arrangements<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">critical stage of the operation<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The agreed transfer rate should not\nexceed the manufacturers recommended<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>flow rate for the cargo hoses.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-small;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; letter-spacing: 0.1pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\">E</span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; letter-spacing: -0.05pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\">l</span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial;\">e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>i<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>al<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.35pt;\"> </span>b<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">o</span>nd<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">i</span>ng<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.25pt;\"> </span>betw<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">e</span>en<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.45pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">t</span>he<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.2pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">v</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">ss</span>el<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">s</span>\u2019<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.3pt;\"> </span>hu<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">l</span>ls<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.15pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">i</span>s<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">n</span>ot<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.15pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">n</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">c</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">s</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">s</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">a</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.1pt;\">r</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">y</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Throughout cargo transfer operations,\nthe both ships should station<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>a<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>responsible person at the cargo manifold area\nto observe the hoses and to<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>check for\nleaks. A responsible person equipped with portable radio should be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>stationed at or near the cargo pump controls\non the discharging ship to take<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>action\nas required.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Cargo transfer should begin at agreed\nslow rate to enable the receiving ship<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>to check that the cargo pipelines system is correct set. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">It should be noted that the incorrect\noperations of pumps and valves can<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>produce pressure surges in a pipeline system. Consideration should be\ngiven<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>to the prevention of pressure\nsurges by careful planning and control of pump<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>speeds and the operation of valves. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">During cargo transfer, appropriate\nballast operations should be performed in<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>order to minimise change in freeboard, and avoid excessive trim by the\nstern. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Throughout the transfer, regular hourly\ntransfer rate checks and comparisons<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>should be made between the two vessels, and the results logged. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The transfer rate should be reduced to\nan agreed topping off rate when the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>receiving ship\u2019s tanks<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>are\nreaching their feeling limit. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">After completion of cargo transfer the\nfollowing operations should be carried<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>out: <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">All hoses drained into one ship prior\nto disconnecting <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Hoses disconnected, taking precautions\nto ensure that no liquid is left in the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>cargo transfer system <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Cargo manifolds and cargo hoses\nsecurely blanked <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Authorities informed of completion of\ncargo transfer and anticipated time of<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>unmooring <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><o:p><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">&nbsp;</span></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><o:p><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">&nbsp;</span></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">UNMOORING\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-small;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">Check\nlist 5 </span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">to be completed before unmooring.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Unmooring can be achieved<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>by singling up fore and aft, then letting go\nthe remaining forward mooring and<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>allowing the bow to swing away from the constant heading ship to the suitable<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>angle, at which time the remaining stern\nmooring line is let to go and the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>manoeuvring ship moves clear. After disengaging, neither ship should\nattempt to steam ahead or fall astern of the<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>other until both ships are well separated.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">It should be noted that local\nconditions or vessel configuration may cause<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>difficulties in separating the two ships and other alternative plans\nshould be<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>considered.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">BEFORE\nFILLING UP THE STS CHECK LIST IT IS IMPORTANT FOR MASTER TO VERIFY IF THE\nCHARTERERS OF SHIPPER HAS GIVEN THE STS COORINATES IN WRITING TO ENSURE \u201c\nTERRITORIAL SEA AND EEZ \u201c RIGHTS OF NEIGHBOURING COUNTRIES ARE NOT INFRINGED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoHeader\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: center 3.0in left 400.0pt right 6.0in; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"MsoNormalTable\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse; mso-table-layout-alt: fixed; width: 665px;\">\n <tbody>\n<tr style=\"mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-irow: 0;\">\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border: 1pt solid windowtext; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 40pt;\" valign=\"top\" width=\"53\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</td>\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border-color: windowtext windowtext windowtext rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: solid solid solid none; border-width: 1pt 1pt 1pt 0px; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 385pt;\" valign=\"top\" width=\"513\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">SHIP TO SHIP TRANSFER MOORING\n  CHECKLISTS<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n</td>\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border-color: windowtext windowtext windowtext rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: solid solid solid none; border-width: 1pt 1pt 1pt 0px; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) windowtext windowtext rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: none solid solid none; border-width: 0px 1pt 1pt 0px; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 73.9pt;\" width=\"99\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</td>\n </tr>\n<tr style=\"mso-yfti-irow: 52;\">\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">Has\n  internal / external communications been tried out?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</td>\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">Has\n  local shipping movement been checked?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</td>\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) windowtext windowtext rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: none solid solid none; border-width: 0px 1pt 1pt 0px; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 73.9pt;\" width=\"99\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</td>\n </tr>\n<tr style=\"mso-yfti-irow: 56; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes;\">\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) windowtext windowtext; border-style: none solid solid; border-width: 0px 1pt 1pt; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 40pt;\" valign=\"top\" width=\"53\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</td>\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) windowtext windowtext rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: none solid solid none; border-width: 0px 1pt 1pt 0px; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 385pt;\" valign=\"top\" width=\"513\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\">Have\n  the local authorities been notified?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</td>\n  <td style=\"background-color: transparent; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) windowtext windowtext rgb(0, 0, 0); border-style: none solid solid none; border-width: 0px 1pt 1pt 0px; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 73.9pt;\" width=\"99\"><div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n</td>\n </tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Note: In case of negative answer pl\ngive brief reason if relevent<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><o:p><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">&nbsp;</span></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: Batang;\"><o:p><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">&nbsp;</span></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The lightering vessel, or support\ntug<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>shall make a navigational warning\nprior to the commencement of lightening operations via VHF.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>If the situation warrants (poor visibility,\nhigh traffic density, vessels drifting or slow steaming, etc.), voice warning\nmust be made at frequent intervals. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoBodyText3\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 6pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">Operations must\nbe carried out in a safe manner and oil pollution must be avoided. these items\nhave first consideration over all other factors, and all the personnel onboard\nshall be made aware of this. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 12pt 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The\nvessel will, at all times, be capable of immediate manoeuvres while engaged in\nthe lightering operations. The main plant must not be immobilized at any time. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoBodyText2\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 12pt 0in 6pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">The vessel should conduct \u201cbreak away\ndrills\u201d<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>prior to arrival to ensure that\nofficers and crew are fully aware of their stations and duties in a lightering\noperation emergency. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 12pt 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">If\nthe operation is carried out underway, full bridge and engine room watches are\nto be maintained on throughout the operation. &nbsp;During still air conditions, a watch must be kept for lightning and thunder. STS loading/ unloading operations must stop immediately in such a scenario.&nbsp; Do NOT under estimate the danger posed by lightning.</span><br />\n<br />\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XBMbWcvgh0o/UBIRG5mqcgI/AAAAAAAAOIE/hoyYpziJMzE/s1600/sdgjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XBMbWcvgh0o/UBIRG5mqcgI/AAAAAAAAOIE/hoyYpziJMzE/s1600/sdgjk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">IN THE EVENT OF A COMMUNICATIONS FAILURE OR THE\nDEVELOPMENT OF AN EQUIPMENT FAILURE AFFECTING THE VESSEL, THE OPERATION SHALL\nBE SUSPENDED UNTIL CORRECTIVE ACTION HAS BEEN COMPLETED.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Individual vessels may have lower\nloading rate capability than the hoses, and the cargo transfer rate should be\nset accordingly. Loading/discharge rates and manifold pressures are to be\nmonitored to ensure that the permitted rates are never exceeded. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoBodyText2\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 6pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">In case oil escapes into the water, all cargo operations\nshall be stopped immediately, the local authorities and the agent shall be\nnotified and the Vessel Response Plan or SOPEP activated as applicable.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoBodyText\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">Prior\nto mooring, vessel should blow soot from boilers. During operations when ships\nare moored together, tubes should not be blown. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoBodyText2\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 6pt; tab-stops: 400.0pt; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-small;\">Transfer of personnel between ships should be conducted with\nthe approval of the Masters and Lightering Master. Those personnel engaging in\ntransfer between the vessels (this includes the lightering support craft in\nattendance) shall wear appropriate PPE and use an approved transfer basket\n(e.g.: Billy Pugh type). Steadying lines shall be used to prevent the basket\nswinging. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-small;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; letter-spacing: -0.05pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;\">S</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold;\">TS<span style=\"letter-spacing: 2pt;\"> </span>D<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">u</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.15pt;\">r</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">in</span>g<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\"> </span>sh<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">i</span>p-t<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">o</span>-<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">s</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">hi</span>p<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">op</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>at<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">i</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">o</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">n</span>s,<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">\ncon</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\">s</span><span -0.05pt;\">iv</span>en<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\"> </span>to <span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>est<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">ic</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">in</span>g<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\"> </span>the\nuse<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">i</span>f\nthe <span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">l</span>at<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">iv</span>e <span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">fr</span>ee<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">bo</span>a<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">d</span>s\nbetween t<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">h</span>e two s<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">hip</span>s m<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">i</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">g</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">h</span>t\ne<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">x</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">po</span>se<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\"> </span>the pe<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>s<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">onn</span>el<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\"> </span>worki<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">n</span>g<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">o</span>n<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\"> </span>d<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.15pt;\">e</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">c</span>k\nto e<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">l</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">c</span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>o-ma<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">g</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">fr</span><span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">o</span>m<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.1pt;\"> </span>t<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">h</span>e<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.15pt;\"> </span><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\">r</span>a<span style=\"letter-spacing: -0.05pt;\">d</span>ar<span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.05pt;\"> </span>s<span This post\ncould be jaundiced nonsense. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">But then allow your conscience be\nyour guide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">Amartya Sen married Emma Georgina\nRothschild in 1991. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Emma isthe sister of\nAmshel Mayer James Rothschild-and half sister of Jacob Rothschild. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>In 1998, Amartya Sen received the Nobel prize.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">Below is the list of awards and\nhonours, Emma wrangled for him. </span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; mso-ansi-language: EN; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">1998: He\nreceived the <a href=\"http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nobel_Memorial_Prize_in_Economic_Sciences\" title=\"Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nobel\nMemorial Prize in Economic Sciences</span></a> for his work in <a href=\"http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Welfare_economics\" title=\"Welfare economics\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">welfare economics</span></a>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;
